quizDescription.text:
Hi all we are going to solve Handwritten digits recognition problem in this week. You were given resources for the problem and you need to solve the problem.

Resources
http://neuralnetworksanddeeplearning.com/chap1.html.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/11DmArIyMeK5y7PrLgfcroU-QVsuKD6SJ/view?usp=sharing

The above two resources represent the same content but in different format you can use any of the resource depends on your convenience.

Complete the following topics in chapter-1 and you will have discussion on the end of the day.
Implementing our network to classify digits
Toward deep learning
